headline: Tracking William Nygren's Harris Associates Portfolio - Q3 2024 Update
summary: Harris Associates' 13F portfolio value rose from $59.08B to $76.62B, with 55 significant securities. Read more about the portfolio's holdings and trades in Q3.

headline: 3 Stocks to Watch From a Prospering Cable Television Industry
summary: Zacks Cable Television industry participants like CMCSA, CHTR and RCI are benefiting from growing demand for high-speed Internet and increased media consumption amid cord-cutting.
